Articles.Content:
Well hello there!

I've been playing this game for some time now and finally decided to join the Forums.

I've done many successful missions already (and wayyyyy more unsuccessful missions) and found out that I totally suck with rockets but rock with (space) planes and this is what my Space Program is build on now.

 

So yeah, hello there!
Hello and welcome to the forum. You will find many fellow spaceplane enthusiasts here. (Not me. I suck at them.)
